about_the_game:
In a parallel universe, everything seems normal—until that fateful night. Suddenly, the beautiful women around you start falling for you as if you were the main character in a game. It’s a sweet trap that pulls you in, but just as you’re about to indulge in this newfound love, destiny delivers a cruel twist—the one you cherish most abruptly parts ways with you, leaving an endless void of regret.

In this world brimming with fantasy and challenges, you’ll embark on an emotional journey. As you explore diverse scenes and unlock hidden storylines, you’ll seek to rediscover lost love and rebuild the bonds with those who matter. Every choice you make will shape your relationships with the characters, leading to different endings.

Can you withstand the trials of time and find the true meaning of love in an endless cycle of life? In this sci-fi romance, you’ll experience warmth and healing, and witness the growth of the heart as you navigate through the intricacies of emotions.

Are you ready to embrace this emotional adventure? Join us now, explore this wondrous world, and find the love that’s meant for you!
